name: Frozen Winter - Episode 1
description:
A girl finds herself in a distant land where ice is infused with magic.

She doesn't remember how she got there..

She can't remember even her own name..

Who is this girl and what will her fate be?

Play Frozen Winter - Episode 1 to begin with her a quest in search for answers.

Game made by George Katsianos aka Winterwolf Icewind with RPG Maker MV.

This is a free game.

I hope you enjoy this game!

If you do, let your friends know about it!
